languages.text: "О, я знаю, о чем вы говорите. Знаю парней, которые не уследили за тем, куда тянут руки, и остались без оных. Я не была бы столь хороша в своем деле, если бы не умела оценивать риски. Вдобавок... {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Император{/g} защищает, шерин. Воистину это так. Мне приходилось убеждаться в этом вновь и вновь".

traits.locale_text: "О, я знаю, о чем вы говорите. Знаю парней, которые не уследили за тем, куда тянут руки, и остались без оных. Я не была бы столь хороша в своем деле, если бы не умела оценивать риски. Вдобавок... Император защищает, шерин. Воистину это так. Мне приходилось убеждаться в этом вновь и вновь".

languages.text: "Oh, I know what you're talking about. I know a few guys who couldn't keep their hands to themselves and ended up losing them. I wouldn't be so good at what I do if I didn't know how to assess risk. Besides... the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protects, shereen. It really is true. I've seen it myself time and time again."
languages.original_text: "О, я знаю, о чем вы говорите. Знаю парней, которые не уследили за тем, куда тянут руки, и остались без оных. Я не была бы столь хороша в своем деле, если бы не умела оценивать риски. Вдобавок... {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Император{/g} защищает, шерин. Воистину это так. Мне приходилось убеждаться в этом вновь и вновь".

I wouldn't be so good at what I do if I didn't know how to assess risks. Besides... The Emperor protects, shereen. It really is true. I've seen it myself time and time again."

Besides... the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protects, shereen. It really is true. I've seen it myself time and time again."

languages.text: “噢，我明白你的意思。我认识几个人，那些人管不住手，最后连手都没了。如果我不知道如何评估风险，我就不可能如此擅长我的工作。而且……{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}会保佑祂的子民，亲爱的。这句话是真的，我曾无数次亲眼见证过祂的庇护。”
languages.original_text: "Oh, I know what you're talking about. I know a few guys who couldn't keep their hands to themselves and ended up losing them. I wouldn't be so good at what I do if I didn't know how to assess risk. Besides... the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protects, shereen. It really is true. I've seen it myself time and time again."

traits.locale_text: “噢，我明白你的意思。我认识几个人，那些人管不住手，最后连手都没了。如果我不知道如何评估风险，我就不可能如此擅长我的工作。而且……{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}会保佑祂的子民，亲爱的。这句话是真的，我曾无数次亲眼见证过祂的庇护。”

languages.text: «Ah, entiendo lo que quiere decir. Me sé de algunos que no supieron dejar las manos en sus bolsillos y acabaron perdiéndolas. No sería tan buena en lo que hago si no supiera evaluar el riesgo. Además... El {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} nos protege, shereen. Es muy cierto. Lo he visto con mis propios ojos muchas veces».
languages.original_text: "Oh, I know what you're talking about. I know a few guys who couldn't keep their hands to themselves and ended up losing them. I wouldn't be so good at what I do if I didn't know how to assess risk. Besides... the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protects, shereen. It really is true. I've seen it myself time and time again."

traits.locale_text: «Ah, entiendo lo que quiere decir. Me sé de algunos que no supieron dejar las manos en sus bolsillos y acabaron perdiéndolas. No sería tan buena en lo que hago si no supiera evaluar el riesgo. Además... El {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} nos protege, shereen. Es muy cierto. Lo he visto con mis propios ojos muchas veces».

languages.text: 「ああ、言ってることは分かるよ。手を出さずにはいられなくて、結局は手を失くした奴らを何人か知ってるさ。リスクの測り方が分からなければ、あたしは自分の仕事をこれほどうまくこなせなかっただろうね。それに…{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}がお守りくださるさ、シャリーン。本当だよ。この目で何度も見てきた」
languages.original_text: "Oh, I know what you're talking about. I know a few guys who couldn't keep their hands to themselves and ended up losing them. I wouldn't be so good at what I do if I didn't know how to assess risk. Besides... the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protects, shereen. It really is true. I've seen it myself time and time again."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、言ってることは分かるよ。手を出さずにはいられなくて、結局は手を失くした奴らを何人か知ってるさ。リスクの測り方が分からなければ、あたしは自分の仕事をこれほどうまくこなせなかっただろうね。それに…{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}がお守りくださるさ、シャリーン。本当だよ。この目で何度も見てきた」

languages.text: "Oh, ich weiß, wovon Ihr sprecht. Ich kenne einige, die ihre Hände nicht bei sich behalten konnten und sie am Ende verloren haben. Aber ich wäre nicht so gut in dem, was ich mache, wenn ich keine Risiken einschätzen könnte. Außerdem ... der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} schützt uns, Shereen. Das stimmt wirklich. Ich habe es immer wieder selbst gesehen."
languages.original_text: "Oh, I know what you're talking about. I know a few guys who couldn't keep their hands to themselves and ended up losing them. I wouldn't be so good at what I do if I didn't know how to assess risk. Besides... the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protects, shereen. It really is true. I've seen it myself time and time again."

traits.locale_text: "Oh, ich weiß, wovon Ihr sprecht. Ich kenne einige, die ihre Hände nicht bei sich behalten konnten und sie am Ende verloren haben. Aber ich wäre nicht so gut in dem, was ich mache, wenn ich keine Risiken einschätzen könnte. Außerdem ... der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} schützt uns, Shereen. Das stimmt wirklich. Ich habe es immer wieder selbst gesehen."

languages.text: « Oh, je le sais mieux que quiconque. Je connais pas mal de gens qui n'ont pas su retenir leur cupidité et qui s'en sont mordu la langue. Je ne serais pas aussi douée dans mon domaine si je ne savais pas évaluer correctement un risque. Et puis... l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} nous protège, shereen. C'est vrai. Je l'ai vu plus d'une fois de mes yeux. »
languages.original_text: "Oh, I know what you're talking about. I know a few guys who couldn't keep their hands to themselves and ended up losing them. I wouldn't be so good at what I do if I didn't know how to assess risk. Besides... the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protects, shereen. It really is true. I've seen it myself time and time again."

traits.locale_text: « Oh, je le sais mieux que quiconque. Je connais pas mal de gens qui n'ont pas su retenir leur cupidité et qui s'en sont mordu la langue. Je ne serais pas aussi douée dans mon domaine si je ne savais pas évaluer correctement un risque. Et puis... l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} nous protège, shereen. C'est vrai. Je l'ai vu plus d'une fois de mes yeux. »

languages.text: "Ya, bilmez miyim? Eline koluna mukayyet olamayıp nihayetinde hepten kaybeden birkaç tanıdığım oldu. Risk değerlendirmeyi bilmesem yaptığım işte bu kadar iyi olmazdım. Ayrıca... {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g} korur şirinim, koruyor da. Defalarca gördüm bunu."
languages.original_text: "Oh, I know what you're talking about. I know a few guys who couldn't keep their hands to themselves and ended up losing them. I wouldn't be so good at what I do if I didn't know how to assess risk. Besides... the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protects, shereen. It really is true. I've seen it myself time and time again."

traits.locale_text: "Ah, bilmez miyim? Eline koluna mukayyet olamayıp nihayetinde hepten kaybeden birkaç adam oldu. Risk değerlendirmeyi bilmesem yaptığım işte bu kadar iyi olmazdım. Ayrıca... {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g} korur şirinim. Koruyor da, kendim de defalarca gördüm."
